definition: to form/to organize/group/team/classifier for sets, series, groups of people, batteries
Al-Qaeda/same as 基地組織|基地组织
pinyin: Ji1 di4 Kong3 bu4 Zu3 zhi1

sentences.english: Formed shortly after the breakup of the USSR.
sentences.chinese: 这个恐怖组织成立于前苏联解体之后。

sentences.english: The resolution "provides encouragement for terrorist organisations worldwide and undermines global peace".
sentences.chinese: 该决议“鼓励了全世界的恐怖组织，破坏世界和平”。

sentences.english: Little attention is being given to the world's newly-appointed top terrorist.
sentences.chinese: 这个新任命的恐怖组织头目几乎没有受到关注。

sentences.english: The "ETIM" is a terrorist organization, which is recognized by the international community.
sentences.chinese: “东伊运”是国际社会公认的恐怖组织。

sentences.english: These hijackers are often members of international terrorist organisations.
sentences.chinese: 这些劫机犯的成员往往是国际恐怖组织。

sentences.english: We responded exactly as these terrorist organizations wanted us to respond.
sentences.chinese: 但我们做出的反应却正中那些恐怖组织的下怀。

sentences.english: The World Uygur Congress has consisted of terrorist groups since its foundation.
sentences.chinese: “世维会”从成立之日起就是由恐怖组织构成的。

sentences.english: Furthermore, terrorist groups in different regions have strengthened their contacts and collaboration among themselves.
sentences.chinese: 各地区恐怖组织也加强了相互联系和呼应。

sentences.english: Inviting terrorists to take part in the talks has created a hostage to fortune.
sentences.chinese: 邀请恐怖组织参加会谈是引狼入室。

sentences.english: The best hope we have is to go after and destroy the terrorist organization.
sentences.chinese: 我们最好的希望还是主动追逐并摧毁恐怖组织。

sentences.english: The terrorists defy the government and successively practice the bombing activity.
sentences.chinese: 恐怖组织蔑视政府，接连实施爆炸活动。

sentences.english: The U.S. considers the FARC a terrorist organization.
sentences.chinese: 美国认为哥伦比亚武装革命力量是一个恐怖组织。

sentences.english: Akatsuki is a Terrorist organization, composed by ten people.
sentences.chinese: “晓”是一个恐怖组织，它由十人组成。

definition: Muslim countries/caliphate/Islamic State group (aka IS or ISIL or ISIS)

pinyin: Ku4 er3 de2 Gong1 ren2 dang3
